events.message: I received the wrong product in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this item does not meet my needs.
The customer's issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on their request for a money back due to receiving the wrong product.
The support case has been assigned to Agent Lisa for handling the refund request and further communication with the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you received the wrong product and want a refund. Iâ€™m here to help resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the product you received so that I can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached a photo of the product that shows the incorrect item clearly.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and arrange for a prepaid return shipping label to be sent to your email.
Thanks for the quick response and solution. I appreciate the refund and will return the product using the shipping label once received.
The refund has been processed successfully and the return shipping label was emailed to the customer. Case resolved from our side.
Just checking in to confirm you received the return label and that the refund process is going smoothly. Let us know if you need further assistance.
Thank you for your cooperation. We are closing this support case now. Please contact us anytime if you have other concerns or questions.
